posts.post_title: FS: N28 Pool and Billiard 9 Card Set
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have a 9 card Pool and Billiard N28 Allen and Ginter Subset for sale. All cards are SGC and PSA graded. $575 for the lot, free shipping. Paypal, check or money orders. Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]

Pictures can be seen by following the link below. 
[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/BILLIARD-Set-Allen-Ginter-N28-Pool-Lot-9-Cards-PSA-SGC-/190455483029?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item2c58080a95[/url]

Thanks
Chris
